name: Space Ants: The Escape
description:
Hey Mates!

This is my first project ever! Done during the end of year 1 of school. It was a culmination of three different subjects worth of work including, Narrative, Programming and 3D Modeling.

It is made for 1920 x 1080 res and is a windows build. You'll have to download the .zip, extract and run the .exe file.

I designed and programmed everything, made all the models and the narrative. The sounds I ripped from various places. Credit goes to whoever owns them, I sadly didn't record what I got from where.

Anyway hope you enjoy my first ever project! 

I'm always looking to improve, and even though It is extremely unlikely that I will ever return to this project, please leave any C&C in the comments section!

Cheers Mates!
